tool_description: Evaluates conversations to determine when human agent intervention is needed based on multiple escalation triggers.

conversation_length.description: Number of exchanges in current conversation

unresolved_issues.description: Count of unresolved issues in conversation

error_messages: Invalid sentiment score: Must be between -1 and 1
Invalid confidence score: Must be between 0 and 1
Invalid conversation length: Must be positive integer
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [basic, premium, enterprise]
usage: Provide sentiment_score, intent_confidence, and conversation_length as required metrics. Include unresolved_issues and customer_tier for enhanced escalation logic.

priority_level.description: Escalation priority: low, medium, high, urgent

estimated_wait_time.description: Estimated wait time in minutes for human agent
